event.title: Starting Point
event.content: Basic content team starts here

event.title: Starting Point
event.content: Hello %prename%, please select a country you want to get more information about from the list below.

event.title: Welcome
event.content: From here you are starting to play Brasil!

event.title: Welcome
event.content: From here you are starting to play Spain!

event.title: Welcome
event.content: From here you are starting to play China!

event.title: Welcome
event.content: From here you are starting to play USA!

event.title: Welcome
event.content: From here you are starting to play Sweden!

event.title: Welcome
event.content: From here you are starting to play India!
The journey begins..
We will arrive in 1h!
The ferry arrives at the harbor of Stockholm. Your new colleagues are waiting.

event.title: Welcome
event.content: Välkommen %prename% to our beautiful country Sweden! My name is Hans, this is Lotta. We are two of your new colleagues!
event.option: Hi, I am %prename%, it's a pleasure to meet you guys!

event.title: Welcome
event.content: How was your journey, %prename% ?
event.option: Well, I didn't get seasick, so it was fine.
There were no problems, I enjoyed the panoranic view.
Pretty bad, unfortunately I got seasick. That's your fault because of your strange traditional ferry.
Interesting, it was the first time traveling on a ferry.

event.content: I feel sorry for you, I know exactly what you mean, I always get seasick, too. That's why I travel by plane or car.

event.title: Welcome
event.content: Well, we ordered a taxi which brings you to your accomodation and afterwards to the office. Tonight we would like to invite you to a typical Swedish tradition. We will have a sauna with some colleagues to get to know each other. It would be great if you join us.
event.option: Thank you for inviting me. I am looking forward to join you. I really like that.
Sure, that sounds nice, thank you!
Oh,well .. I don't know .. I'd rather rest after this long journey.

event.title: Welcome
event.content: Oh no, we scheduled this get-together especially for you. It would be really sad if you couldn't make it. Please reconsider your decision.
event.option: Okay, if you insist I will join you!

event.content: Perfect, that will be fun! Let's meet up at 6 p.m. at Hellasgarden. See you later! Hej da!
Okay see you!
Sauna

event.title: Welcome
event.content: Välkommen to a typical Swedish sauna, %prename% . You already know Lotta, please meet Laura, our German colleague.

event.title: Welcome
event.content: Hej hej, %prename% , nice to meet you. I have been working here for a few months.
event.option: Hi Laura, it's a pleasure. It's getting pretty hot in here, isn't it? Eh .. I mean .. the sauna. Do you do that regularly?

event.title: Welcome
event.content: Yes, that's totally normal in our team. Has everything worked out after we left you at the harbor? I'm curious, how is your accomodation?
event.option: Perfect! The taxi driver was funny.
No! I think I paid way too much.

event.title: Welcome
event.content: The apartment is pretty nice, but I have to say: it looks like an Ikea catalog. However, the area around it seems beautiful. It is located near the Nobelmuseum.

event.title: Welcome
event.content: Oh cool! Indeed, it is one of the most beautiful areas in Stockholm. And I live there as well. I can give you some advice for grovery shopping, restaurants and bars, if you like.
Zischen

event.title: Welcome
event.content: Toppen! I have to say: That's a glorious team; I'm really looking forward to collaborate with you. How about we have something to eat now? We could have a Falafel, that's typical Swedish. Stockholm's best one is just around the corner!

event.title: Welcome
event.content: Hello %prename%! After a ten hour flight, you land at the Beijing Airport. Picking up your luggage was not a problem and you search for the Exit signs. You are a little overwhelmed with all the Chinese signs everywhere. When exiting the baggage area, you see a lot of people with name signs. Choose the right one...
You have chosen the right driver. How would you greet him?
event.option: I reach out to give him/her my hand.
I wave and stand in front of him/her to greet him/her without reaching out my hand.
I stand in front of him/her and slightly bow my head.

event.content: This is correct. In China it is common to slightly bow your head to greet each other. However, at places where a large number of foreigners is present, for example at a airport, people greet each other by shaking hands.The driver takes your suitcase and leads the way to the car. Driving to the hotel...

The driver acts totally confused and does not know what to do. This would not be an appropriate way of greeting someone.The driver takes your suitcase and leads the way to the car. Driving to the hotel...

The driver acts totally confused and does not know what to do. This is an appropriate way of greeting each other in China, where there are no foreigners. The driver takes your suitcase and leads the way to the car. Driving to the hotel...
